description: Warm up any occasion with a little mulled cider. Brilliant to make for after a chilly weekend walk.

default: half an orange studded with 3-4 cloves
1 lemon and ginger herbal tea bag

show.b073qz82: Good Food Friday with Michel Roux Jr and Olly Smith

steps: Put the apple juice and sugar into a pan and stir. Warm together until the sugar is dissolved. Add the cinnamon stick and the half orange studded with cloves. Add the cider and orange liqueur and warm gently

Put in the lemon and ginger teabag and leave to infuse for 2 minutes and then remove. Warm, do not boil, for 10 min so that all flavours infuse. Serve warm. If pre-preparing, remove spices and fruit and keep warm.
tips: Replace the cider with more apple juice and leave out the orange liqueur for a family-friendly treat.
title: Mulled cider
